/* com.biz.framework.mapper.pages.PayrollmngMapper.findPayrollList */
SELECT SM.CONFIRM_SEQ, ST.SETTLEMENT_SEQ, ST.PROD_ID, PR.PROD_NAME, ST.USER_ID, EP.EMP_NAME, ST.CUST_ID, CU.CUST_NAME, ST.REQ_DATE, ST.PROD_AMT, ST.SALE_AMT, ST.INFLOW_CNT, ST.REQ_GUBUN, ST.EXPECT_AMT, ST.EXPECT_RATE_AMT, DATE_FORMAT(ST.DATE_WORK_FROM, '%Y-%m-%d') AS DATE_WORK_FROM, DATE_FORMAT(ST.DATE_WORK_TO, '%Y-%m-%d') AS DATE_WORK_TO, ST.WORK_DAY, IFNULL(ST.INCENTIVE_RATE, 0) AS INCENTIVE_RATE, ST.SALE_TOTAL_AMT, CAST(SM.CONFIRM_AMT - SM.CONFIRM_MILEAGE AS UNSIGNED) AS CONFIRM_AMT, CAST((ST.SALE_TOTAL_AMT - ST.PROD_TOTAL_AMT) * 1.1 AS UNSIGNED) AS CONFIRM_COST_AMT, SM.CONFIRM_RATE_AMT, ST.REFUND_IND, SM.ATCH_ID, CD.CODE_NAME AS REQ_GUBUN_NAME, SM.TAX_IND, DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(SM.PAY_YM, '01'), '%Y-%m') AS PAY_YM FROM SETTLEMENTMST SM JOIN SETTLEMENT ST ON ST.CO_CODE = SM.CO_CODE AND ST.SETTLEMENT_SEQ = SM.SETTLEMENT_SEQ LEFT JOIN TB_CUSTOMER CU ON ST.CO_CODE = CU.CO_CODE AND ST.CUST_ID = CU.BIZ_NO LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCTS PR ON ST.CO_CODE = PR.CO_CODE AND ST.PROD_ID = PR.PROD_ID LEFT JOIN TB_EMP EP ON ST.CO_CODE = EP.CO_CODE AND ST.USER_ID = EP.EMP_ID LEFT JOIN CDBASE CD ON ST.CO_CODE = CD.CO_CODE AND CD.PATTERN_CODE = 'SE01' AND ST.REQ_GUBUN = CD.BASE_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND ST.CO_CODE = #{loginCoId} AND (DATE_FORMAT(#{searchPayYmStart} , '%Y%m%d') <= ST.DATE_WORK_FROM) AND (DATE_FORMAT(#{searchPayYmEnd} , '%Y%m%d') >= ST.DATE_WORK_TO)
AND PR.PROD_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{prodName} ,'%')
AND EP.EMP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{empName} ,'%')
AND CU.CUST_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{custName} ,'%')
AND SM.PAY_YM IS NOT NULL
AND (SM.PAY_YM IS NULL OR SM.PAY_YM = '')
ORDER BY CONFIRM_SEQ, ST.REQ_DATE
